review_data.title: Awesome asian finger food
review_data.content: Great kitchen, cozy place, super friendly staff, food is awesome and so tasty. I strongly recommend this place. Maguro tatakami and shrimps in garlic are my favorite. Dessert (if there are any left) is delicious.

review_data.title: Great food, not cheap

review_data.title: Lunch

review_data.title: Lunch
review_data.content: Das Essen ist sehr gut, die Mittagsmenues sehr abwechslungsreich. sehr freundliche Bedienung. Immer wieder gerne, macht weiter so.

review_data.title: Perfect for lunch
review_data.content: Great Shanghai buns and Portuguese egg tarts. The daily special of spicy eggplants on rice was also good. It was quite small and busy, but the service was still fast and good. Will definitely go back again.

review_data.content: Small dining room, tastefully decorated (modern), friendly service. Very nice terrace ( courtyard). Excellent chinese streetfood, eg. sexy fresh tasty dumplings, tapas style food. Prices for Zurich and the quality (fresh, well spiced, nicely presented) moderate. A very welcome alternative to the mediocre chinese restaurant...More
